title: StrongHold 2 Deluxe [RTS Game for Pc]
description:
StongHold 2 Deluxe.
Labelled: FireFly Studios
RTS.
Copied CD-ROM.[exe]
NoCD fix [burn image to CD/DVD]
Delivered in rar folder contains:-
> StrongHold exe,
> NoCD fix,[from GameCopyWorld.com]
> Instructions how to install

Requirements:-
98/ME/2000/XP
256 RAM
1.4GHz CPU

Extract the files from the rar folder and run AutoRun.exe to install the game and secondly install the patches after.

Extract the noCD fix from the rar folder named SH2DISK21mage.rar

Mount the noCD fix image NEEDS EMULATION.mds with Daemon Tools Virtual CD/DVD-ROM, get Daemon Tools from the link below. Go to My Computer to resume play.

HOW TO MOUNT THE IMAGE WITH DAEMON TOOLS:-
------------------------------------------
Hover your mouse over Daemon Tools icon on the taskbar > Virtual CD/DVD-rom > Device > click Mount Image and browse and open NEEDS EMULATION.mds

Get a rar extractor here if you havent one, recommend 7Zip. <a href="
http://www.filehippo.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.filehippo.com/</a>
Once installed, simply right click the rar folder and choose extract here.

If the noCD fix dosent work, download this one
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4569091/Stronghold_2_patch_crack" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4569091/Stronghold_2_patch_crack</a>

1, run the update
2, decompress the rar folder [right click, extract here],
3, copy the brown icon named Stronghold2
4, go-to My Computer > Local Disk > Program Files > Firefly Studios > paste the brown icon into the folder Stronghold 2 > click yes to over-write the original one...done...play the game.

PLEASE NOTE
-----------
Dont drag and drop it into the folder,it will not work, copy and then paste it.
